name: Republic of China
startIntroPart1: Chiang Kai-shek, leader of the ROC with the goal to spread Nationalism and democracy threw China was very close but the Sino-Japanese war lead to China being weakened and Pushed to Taiwan by the Communist
startIntroPart2: Chiang Kai-shek can you try again and bring your goal to China ?
declaringWar: The Republic of China Declares war on you
attacked: We will show no mercy long live the ROC!
defeated: China will rise up again one day
introduction: I am Chiang Kai-shek Leader of the Republic of China.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
